name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior HTML Engineer with 13+ years of experience in crafting high-performance web applications. Proficient in **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, with a strong focus on responsive design utilizing frameworks such as **Bootstrap** and **Tailwind**. Familiar with design tools like **Figma** and skilled in preprocessors such as **Sass** and **Less**. Experienced in build tools including **Gulp** and **Webpack** to streamline development processes.

In addition to frontend expertise, I have robust backend skills in technologies including **Node.js**, and I've delivered AI/ML-powered applications leveraging frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**. I have a strong understanding of modern development practices including microservices and CI/CD pipelines, coupled with extensive experience in cloud environments like **AWS** and **Azure**. 

I am also well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards. My robust background in MLOps, covering model training and orchestration using **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**, further complements my technical abilities. I am dedicated to delivering innovative and scalable solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors.
